com.github.triceo.splitlog.api

Interface LogWatch

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageProducer<LogWatch>

    public interface LogWatch
extends MessageProducer<LogWatch>
    The primary point of interaction with this tool. Allows users to start listening to changes in log files.

    • Method Summary

        The file that is being tracked by this class.
        Returns:
        Never null

      • isFollowedBy

        boolean isFollowedBy(Follower follower)
        Whether or not stopFollowing(Follower) has been called for a given follower.
        Parameters:
        follower - Tailer in question.
        Returns:
        True if it has.

      • isHandingDown

        boolean isHandingDown(MessageMeasure<? extends Number,Follower> measure)
        Whether or not particular MessageMeasure is being automatically handed down to new Followers.
        Parameters:
        measure - Measure in question.
        Returns:
        True after startHandingDown(MessageMeasure, String) has been called and before stopHandingDown(MessageMeasure).

      • isHandingDown

        boolean isHandingDown(String id)
        Whether or not particular MessageMeasure is being automatically handed down to new Followers.
        Parameters:
        id - ID in question.
        Returns:
        True after startHandingDown(MessageMeasure, String) has been called and before stopHandingDown(String).

      • isStarted

        boolean isStarted()
        Whether or not start() has been called.
        Returns:
        True if it has.

      • isStopped

        boolean isStopped()
        Whether or not stop() has been called.
        Returns:
        True if it has.

      • start

        boolean start()
        Start tailing the log file.
        Returns:
        True if just started, false if already started.

      • startFollowing

        Follower startFollowing()
        Begin watching for new messages from this point in time.
        Returns:
        API for watching for messages.

      • startHandingDown

        boolean startHandingDown(MessageMeasure<? extends Number,Follower> measure,
                         String id)
        Every new Follower from now on will immediately receive a new MessageMetric instance with a given ID that is using the given measure instance.
        Parameters:
        measure - Measure to use in the newly created MessageMetric instance.
        id - The ID to locate the MessageMetric using MessageProducer.getMetric(String). No relation to the ID used by MessageProducer.startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String).
        Returns:
        False if either the measure or the ID is already being handed down.

      • stop

        boolean stop()
        Stop all followers from following and free resources. Will terminate every running measurement via MessageMetric.
        Returns:
        True if terminated as a result, false if already terminated.

      • stopFollowing

        boolean stopFollowing(Follower follower)
        Stop particular follower from following.
        Parameters:
        follower - This follower will receive no more messages.
        Returns:
        True if terminated as a result, false if already terminated.

      • stopHandingDown

        boolean stopHandingDown(MessageMeasure<? extends Number,Follower> measure)
        Invalidate startHandingDown(MessageMeasure, String). No further Follower will automatically receive MessageMetric using this measure by default.
        Parameters:
        measure - The measure to no longer be handing down to newly instantiated Followers.
        Returns:
        False if it wasn't being handed down.

      • stopHandingDown

        boolean stopHandingDown(String id)
        Invalidate startHandingDown(MessageMeasure, String). No further Follower will automatically receive MessageMetric using this measure by default.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the MessageMeasure to no longer be handing down to newly instantiated Followers. No relation to the ID used by MessageProducer.startMeasuring(MessageMeasure, String) .
        Returns:
        False if it wasn't being handed down.
